Lines: From now on, the fight is alla bout willpower.
You don't have to force yourself to follow, okay?
Don't be so mean!
I won't give up until the end!
Ah. If its going to be that way, lets at least
be a thorn in Federations side.
So, first we'll go out to harass enemy's new MS testing?
Ha ha ha! That's nice!
I like how you think, Captain.
Hehe, let's start small and work our way up...
Putting everything on one card is recipe for disaster.
Hehehe.. I see.
Let's harras them to the end!
According to my information, Federation is treating
mop-up ops as nothing more than live-fire exercise.
Acting like that is gonna backfire on them.
They're gonna wish they kept training at base
and launching directly to space!
Brauer's Squad, let's go!
Roger that!
